publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3523 Gil Paterson: East Dunbartonshire China Learning Centre—That the Parliament wishes East Dunbartonshire Council well in the establishment of its China Learning Centre; congratulates the council on the informative presentation, in English and Mandarin, given at the opening ceremony at St Ninian’s High School, Bishopbriggs, and encourages all pupils in the catchment area to participate in the Confucius Classroom Hub, which provides information about Chinese culture and language and will help develop good relations between Scotland and China.

S3M-3523 East Dunbartonshire China Learning Centre (lodged on 24 February 2009) Anne McLaughlin*, Alasdair Allan*, Tom McCabe*, Bob Doris*, Christina McKelvie*, Kenneth Gibson*, Sandra White*, Rob Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Wilson*
S3M-3523 East Dunbartonshire China Learning Centre (lodged on 24 February 2009) Jackie Baillie*

S3M-3523 Gil Paterson: East Dunbartonshire China Learning Centre—That the Parliament wishes East Dunbartonshire Council well in the establishment of its China Learning Centre; congratulates the council on the informative presentation, in English and Mandarin, given at the opening ceremony at St Ninian’s High School, Bishopbriggs, and encourages all pupils in the catchment area to participate in the Confucius Classroom Hub, which provides information about Chinese culture and language and will help develop good relations between Scotland and China. Supported by: Anne McLaughlin, Alasdair Allan, Tom McCabe, Bob Doris, Christina McKelvie, Kenneth Gibson, Sandra White, Rob Gibson, Stuart McMillan, Bill Wilson, Jackie Baillie, Jack McConnell*
S3M-3523 East Dunbartonshire China Learning Centre (lodged on 24 February 2009) Bill Kidd*
S3M-3523 East Dunbartonshire China Learning Centre (lodged on 24 February 2009) Angela Constance*
